_field_real.name: forward weight{forward scale}:[0..1]#weight given to boid's desire to fly straight ahead
leveling force weight{leveling force scale}:[0..1]#weight given to boids desire to fly level
destination weight{sink scale}:[0..1]#weight given to boid's desire to fly towards its sinks
average throttle:[0..1]#throttle at which boids will naturally fly
maximum throttle:[0..1]#maximum throttle applicable
movement weight threshold#The threshold of accumulated weight over which movement occurs
danger radius:wus#distance within which boids will avoid a dangerous object (e.g. the player)
danger weight{danger scale}#weight given to boid's desire to avoid danger
target weight{target scale}:[0..1]#weight given to boid's desire to attack fly after their target, if they have one
target distance:wus#distance within which we aggressively pursue a target
target delay time:seconds#amount of time we need to be locked onto a target before we might start killing it
target kill chance:chance per second#probability of killing your target in one second
ai destroy chance:chance per second#if targetted by AI, the probability of dying in one second

plugin._field_explanation: Recommended initial values: random offset scale= 0.2 offset period bounds= 1, 3

_field_real.name: random offset weight{random offset scale}:[0..1]#weight given to boid's random heading offset

plugin._field_explanation: WARNING: In flocks with a neighborhood radius of 0, creatures are not influenced by the other creatures around them. THESE ARE MUCH CHEAPER.

_field_real.name: neighborhood radius:world units#distance within which one boid is affected by another

_field_angle.name: perception angle:degrees#angle-from-forward within which one boid can perceive and react to another

_field_real.name: avoidance weight{avoidance scale}:[0..1]#weight given to boid's desire to avoid collisions with other boids, when within the avoidance radius
avoidance radius:world units#distance that a boid tries to maintain from another
alignment weight{alignment scale}:[0..1]#weight given to boid's desire to align itself with neighboring boids
position weight{position scale}:[0..1]#weight given to boid's desire to be near flock center
position min radius:wus#distance to flock center beyond which an attracting force is applied
position max radius:wus#distance to flock center at which the maximum attracting force is applied

_field_tag_reference_64.name: single shot sound for idle (randomly plays)

_field_real_bounds.name: time between one off idle sounds per boid (lower to upper bound)

_field_tag_reference_64.name: single shot sound for moving (randomly plays)

_field_real_bounds.name: time between one off moving sounds per boid (lower to upper bound)

_field_tag_reference_64.name: single shot sound for reacting to danger
